rating_categories.name: Rating Pending
rating_categories.description: Not yet assigned a final ESRB rating. Appears only in advertising, marketing and promotional materials related to a physical (e.g., boxed) video game that is expected to carry an ESRB rating, and should be replaced by a game's rarting once it has been assigned.

rating_categories.name: Everyone
rating_categories.description: Content is generally suitable for all ages. May contain minimal cartoon, fantasy or mild violence and/or infrequent use of mild language.

rating_categories.name: Everyone 10+
rating_categories.description: Content is generally suitable for ages 10 and up. May contain more cartoon, fantasy or mild violence, mild language and/or minimal suggestive themes.

rating_categories.name: Teen
rating_categories.description: Content is generally suitable for ages 13 and up. May contain violence, suggestive themes, crude humor, minimal blood, simulated gambling and/or infrequent use of strong language.

rating_categories.name: Mature 17+
rating_categories.description: Content is generally suitable for ages 17 and up. May contain intense violence, blood, and gore, sexual content and/or strong language.

rating_categories.name: Adults Only 18+
rating_categories.description: Content suitable only for adults ages 18 and up. May include prolonged scenes of intense violence, graphic sexual content and/or gambling with real currency.

content_descriptors.name: Alcohol Reference
content_descriptors.description: Reference to and/or images of alcoholic beverages

content_descriptors.name: Animated Blood
content_descriptors.description: Discolored and/or unrealistic depictions of blood

content_descriptors.name: Blood
content_descriptors.description: Depictions of blood

content_descriptors.name: Blood and Gore
content_descriptors.description: Depictions of blood or the mutilation of body parts

content_descriptors.name: Cartoon Violence
content_descriptors.description: Violent actions involving cartoon-like situations and characters. May include violence where a character is unharmed after the action has been inflicted

content_descriptors.name: Comic Mischief
content_descriptors.description: Depictions or dialogue involving slapstick or suggestive humor

content_descriptors.name: Crude Humor
content_descriptors.description: Depictions or dialogue involving vulgar antics, including "bathroom" humor

content_descriptors.name: Drug Reference
content_descriptors.description: Reference to and/or images of illegal drugs

content_descriptors.name: Fantasy Violence
content_descriptors.description: Violent actions of a fantasy nature, involving human or non-human characters in situations easily distinguishable from real life

content_descriptors.name: Intense Violence
content_descriptors.description: Graphic and realistic-looking depictions of physical conflict. May involve extreme and/or realistic blood, gore, weapons and depictions of human injury and death

content_descriptors.name: Language
content_descriptors.description: Mild to moderate use of profanity

content_descriptors.name: Lyrics
content_descriptors.description: Mild references to profanity, sexuality, violence, alcohol or drug use in music

content_descriptors.name: Mature Humor
content_descriptors.description: Depictions or dialogue involving "adult" humor, including sexual references

content_descriptors.name: Nudity
content_descriptors.description: Graphic or prolonged depictions of nudity

content_descriptors.name: Partial Nudity
content_descriptors.description: Brief and/or mild depictions of nudity

content_descriptors.name: Real Gambling
content_descriptors.description: Player can gamble, including betting or wagering real cash or currency

content_descriptors.name: Sexual Content
content_descriptors.description: Non-explicit depictions of sexual behavior, possibly including partial nudity

content_descriptors.name: Sexual Themes
content_descriptors.description: References to sex or sexuality

content_descriptors.name: Sexual Violence
content_descriptors.description: Depictions of rape or other violent sexual acts

content_descriptors.name: Simulated Gambling
content_descriptors.description: Player can gamble without betting or wagering real cash or currency

content_descriptors.name: Strong Language
content_descriptors.description: Explicit and/or frequent use of profanity

content_descriptors.name: Strong Lyrics
content_descriptors.description: Explicit and/or frequent references to profanity, sex, violence, alcohol or drug use in music

content_descriptors.name: Strong Sexual Content
content_descriptors.description: Explicit and/or frequent depictions of sexual behavior, possibly including nudity

content_descriptors.name: Suggestive Themes
content_descriptors.description: Mild provocative references or materials

content_descriptors.name: Tobacco Reference
content_descriptors.description: Reference to and/or images of tobacco products

content_descriptors.name: Use of Alcohol
content_descriptors.description: The consumption of alcoholic beverages

content_descriptors.name: Use of Drugs
content_descriptors.description: The consumption or use of illegal drugs

content_descriptors.name: Use of Tobacco
content_descriptors.description: The consumption of tobacco products

content_descriptors.name: Violence
content_descriptors.description: Scenes involving aggressive conflict. May contain bloodless dismemberment

content_descriptors.name: Violent References
content_descriptors.description: References to violent acts

interactive_elements.name: In-Game Purchases
interactive_elements.description: Contains in-game offers to purchase digital goods or premiums with real world currency, including but not limited to bonus levels, skins, music, virtual coins and other forms of in-game currency, subscriptions, season passes and upgrades (e.g., to disable ads).

interactive_elements.name: In-Game Purchases (Includes Random Items)
interactive_elements.description: Contains in-game offers to purchase digital goods or premiums with real world currency (or with virtual coins or other forms of in-game currency that can be purchased with real world currency) for which the player doesn’t know prior to purchase the specific digital goods or premiums they will be receiving (e.g., loot boxes, item packs, mystery awards).

interactive_elements.name: Users Interact
interactive_elements.description: Indicates possible exposure to unfiltered/uncensored user-generated content, including user-to-user communications and media sharing via social media and networks

interactive_elements.name: Shares Location
interactive_elements.description: Includes the ability to display the user’s location to other users of the app

interactive_elements.name: Unrestricted Internet
interactive_elements.description: Provides unrestricted access to the internet (e.g., browser, search engine)

interactive_elements.name: Online Music Not Rated by the ESRB
interactive_elements.description: Warns that songs that are streamed or downloaded as add-ons for music-based games have not been rated and that their content has not been considered in the ESRB rating assignment.
